attributes.action: Prevent UK participation in any military or war conflict with Iran.
attributes.additional_details: The UK should not support, directly or indirectly, any acts of war against Iran. We urge the Government to reject military escalation and instead prioritise diplomacy, de-escalation, and peaceful foreign policy in the region.
attributes.background: We call on the UK Government to commit to no military involvement in any conflict with Iran under any circumstances. This includes not sending troops, weapons, funding, intelligence, or logistical support.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Commit to no military involvement in attacks on Iran
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730360
